title: Bug 101187Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description:If key is blank, externalized text can't be displayed in chart.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: In properties file, let key blank, but it has valid value.Expected result: it can be externalized in chart title.Actual result: it can't be displayed.
EB: In properties file, let key blank, but it has valid value.Expected result: it can be externalized in chart title.Actual result: it can't be displayed.
SR: Set externalize text in chart title.2.
